xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/529450-A Class Apart: A Mexican American Civil Rights Story 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4G3C5IFuw6LqzSfCPZxrBnEBlsB.jpg Built around the landmark 1954 legal case Hernandez v. Texas, the film interweaves the stories of its central characters with a broader story of the civil rights movement. It also brings to life the heroic post-World War II struggle of Mexican Americans fighting to dismantle the discrimination targeted against them. A Class Apart: A Mexican American Civil Rights Story
